text: "Salve a ti, Nicaragua" (; "Hail to Thee, Nicaragua") is the national anthem of Nicaragua. ==Lyrics== Spanish original IPA transcription Poetic English translation [sˈalβe ˈa tˈi, nˌikaɾˈaɣwa ˈen tˈu swˈelo] [ʝˈa nˈo ɾɾˈuxe lˈa bˈoθ dˈel kaɲˈon] 𝄆 [nˈi sˈe tˈiɲe kˈon sˈaŋɡɾe dˈe eɾmˈanos] [tˈu ɡloɾjˈoso pendˈon bˌikolˈoɾ] 𝄆 [bɾˈiʎe eɾmˈosa lˈa pˈaθ ˈen tˈu θjˈelo] [nˈaða empˈaɲe tˈu ɡlˈoɾja ˌinmoɾtˈal] [kˈe ˈel tɾaβˈaxo ˈes tˈu dˈiɡno la͡ʊɾˈel] [ˈi ˈel onˈoɾ ˈes tˈu ensˈeɲa tɾiumfˈal] [ˈes tˈu ensˈeɲa tɾiumfˈal] Hail to thee, Nicaragua! On thy land roareth the voice of the cannon no more, 𝄆 nor doeth the blood of brothers now stain thy glorious bicolour banner. 𝄇 Let peace shine beautifully in thy sky, and nothing dimmeth thine immortal glory, for labour is thy well-earned laurel and honour is thy triumphal emblem, is thy triumphal emblem! ==References== Category:North American anthems Category:National symbols of Nicaragua
title: Salve a ti, Nicaragua
